wikipedia_page.main: Ryan Wilson (born 18 May  1989) is a rugby union player who plays for Glasgow Warriors as a loose forward. Born in Aldershot in England, he qualifies for Scotland through his maternal grandparents. He made his debut for Scotland in 2013 and has won 50 caps.

response: *Ryan Wilson, Scottish international rugby union player
